name: LightCity Vermin
description:
This is a project I started by myself to learn how to use C# and Unity3D. I chose to create an AI to challenge myself. I started to create a playground for the AI to move around and then I started to implement basic things like moving forward and turning.

You play as a worm running around and dodging guards in the city. There is no way to win, the goal was to create a patrolling AI without using way points.

Control
Left click : turn left

Right click : turn right

Both : Move forward

Esc : Open exit menu
